body: So, today on walls a player was verbally harassing another player and i saw to much of it unfortunately i failed to screenshot it and i'm mad at myself because of it. After that game i decided to take maters into my own hands and i team killed the player that was harassing another player on another map. I now realize what i did was wrong and i apologize for  what i did. I will accept any fair punishments. This may sound childish (me apologizing) but i am truly sorry.

title: Today on Walls

replies.body: Thanks for being honest. Cyberbullying is strictly prohibited on Avicus (and should be on every Minecraft server) so I understand why you did it.
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for being honest. Cyberbullying is strictly prohibited on Avicus (and should be on every Minecraft server) so I understand why you did it.

replies.body: lel, this reminds me of this one time, there was this rlly cocky guy on the other team, so my friend (not naming) joined his team and spleefed him... haha

replies.body: Yeah I teamkilled 2 teamkillers before...not proud of it, but they deserved it. Thanks for being honest about this.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I teamkilled 2 teamkillers before...not proud of it, but they deserved it. Thanks for being honest about this.

replies.body: No problem i just felt bad about it thanks for the comments ;D
replies.body_tagged: No problem i just felt bad about it thanks for the comments ;D

replies.body:
Don't feel bad, it can be frustrating though. Due to my MOD experience on other servers, I can give you a few tips; Don't swear back at them, your stooping to their level. Report it if possible, and sit tight. The MODs are fast on this server.

~The Snow Queen
